data_structure.description: Comprehensive Arabic profanity database covering major dialects with RTL script and romanization support

entry_format.word: The profane word or phrase in Arabic script
entry_format.variations: Common variations and obfuscations in both scripts
entry_format.target_type: Whether it targets individuals, groups, or is general
entry_format.dialect_usage: Regional dialect variations and usage patterns

words.context_notes: Nigger - extremely racist slur, absolutely forbidden. Arabizi: 3abd
Suck my dick bitch - Tunisian extremely vulgar sexual command. Arabizi: arthali zebbi ya ka7ba
Get a penis on your hole - Tunisian extremely vulgar sexual insult. Arabizi: asba3 ala sormek
